translation.en: I'm making the Pit of Doom.

translation.ko: 우린 그냥 흙 가지러 온 건데?

translation.en: But not too much. I know how you guys work.
translation.ko: 너무 많이는 안 돼 너희가 어떻게 노는지 알거든

translation.en: Look straight to the glass. You will not be there.
translation.ko: 거울을 똑바로 봐, 넌 거기에 없어

translation.en: Hey. Pancakes sound good, or is it more of a waffles-for-the-weekend thing?
translation.ko: 안녕, 팬케이크 괜찮니? 주말이라 와플이 나으려나?

translation.en: I guess I do need a frog.
[Travis] Bean's pit isn't gonna catch anything.
translation.ko: 빈은 저 구덩이로 아무것도 못 잡을걸?

translation.en: [Trevor] Yeah, trapping pits are normally rectangular.
Ew, ew! Get those worms away.
Wanna help make the Pit of Doom?
It's gonna be awesomer than that cave we made.
translation.ko: 우리가 만들었던 동굴보다 더 멋질 거야

translation.en: I do not play make-believe in the dirt anymore.
translation.ko: 난 이제 흙바닥에서 상상 놀이 안 하거든?

translation.en: Well, you do play make-believe that you're a grown-up.
[Bean] Just because you're 12 doesn't make you the boss of me, Nancy.
translation.ko: 12살이면 다야? 나한테 이래라저래라 하지 마, 낸시

translation.en: -[Nancy] Little sisters are so annoying! -[Bean scoffs, grunts]
Leo! You have to come over after breakfast!
We have to finish the Pit of Doom today, okay?
translation.ko: 파멸의 구덩이 오늘 다 파야 하니까, 알았지?

translation.en: I said you have to come over after breakfast and finish the--
Sorry, Mrs. Trantz. It was an accident.
Accidents are what happen when little children don't behave.
translation.ko: 실수란 꼬맹이들이 멋대로 굴 때 일어나는 거란다

translation.en: [gasps] Dottsy! Do not let Bernice Blue interrupt your tinkle time.
translation.ko: 돗치, 버니스 블루는 신경 쓰지 말고 쉬야해

translation.en: We don't like children. Do we, Dottsy? [gasps]
We don't because they're yucky and mucky and icky, icky, icky.
All right, my baby. Okay, let's do this.
[Mrs. Trantz] Just remember, I have your mother's phone number.
translation.ko: 잊지 마라 나 네 어머니 전화번호 안다

translation.en: [Charlotte] I have to take the girls shopping later. Wanna come?
translation.ko: 이따 애들 데리고 쇼핑 갈 건데 - 같이 갈래? - 랄랄라, 무슨 말 했어?

translation.en: [David] La, la, la. Were you saying something?
translation.ko: - 같이 갈래? - 랄랄라, 무슨 말 했어?

translation.en: [Charlotte] Do you want to take the girls shopping?
translation.ko: - 같이 갈래? - 랄랄라, 무슨 말 했어? 당신이 애들 데리고 쇼핑할래?

translation.en: [David] Sorry, I can't hear you, so I probably can't help.
translation.ko: 미안, 하나도 안 들려서 못 도와줄 거 같아

translation.en: Mom, there's a place that does ear-piercing right by where we're shopping today.
translation.ko: 엄마, 오늘 쇼핑하는 곳 바로 옆에 귀 뚫어주는 데가 있어요

translation.en: If Mrs. Trantz calls, it was an accident.
translation.ko: 트랜츠 아줌마한테서 전화 오면 그건 실수였어요

translation.en: Hey, Dad, Leo and me are going to finish the Pit of Doom today.
translation.ko: 아빠, 오늘 리오랑 나랑 파멸의 구덩이 다 팔 거예요

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz on phone] She is out of control.
Do you mean my pit? The one I was digging for the tree?
translation.ko: 아빠가 나무 심으려고 판 그 구덩이 말이지?

translation.en: Yes! It's in case any bears or bad guys come into our yard.
translation.ko: 네, 마당에 곰이나 악당이 왔을 때를 대비해야죠

translation.en: They'll fall in and be trapped.
You actually think you're gonna catch a bear?
I could train her and take her to this week's show-and-tell.
translation.ko: 훈련해서 이번 주 발표 수업에 데려갈 거야

translation.en: Well, if I were you, I'd be sure to consider the standing height of your average grizzly.
So you know how deep to dig the pit.
translation.ko: 그래야 구덩이를 얼마나 깊이 팔지 알지

translation.en: -I don't know where she gets it from. -[David] Yeah!
Come on, Nancy. Show us how it's done.
That's our rule. We hear the music, and we have to dance.
translation.ko: 우리 집 규칙이잖아 음악이 나오면 무조건 춤추기

translation.en: Grow up. The rules have changed.
[Charlotte] Your mother never let you? Really?
[Mrs. Trantz] My mother would never have…
No name-calling, and no playing tricks.
Sometimes being gross on purpose is useful.
translation.ko: 일부러 더러운 짓 하는 게 쓸모 있을 때도 있어

translation.en: You know that if you break three rules in one day, that's it.
translation.ko: 하루에 규칙 세 개를 어기면 어떻게 되는지 알 텐데?

translation.en: -[Charlotte] Yes. Yes. Bye. -Oh, hey, Bean. Bean. Bean.
-[David] Try to stay clean today because-- -[sighs]
You and I are taking Nancy shopping in a bit for school clothes.
translation.ko: 이따가 엄마랑 같이 언니 학교 옷 사러 갈 거거든

translation.en: -You might wanna get something too. -[Bean shouting] No!
translation.ko: - 너도 사고 싶은 게 있을지 몰라 - 싫어요!

translation.en: I need to find a frog.
Oh, like one for a pet?
and getting ready to donate his body to science and/or magic.
translation.ko: 과학이나 마법을 위해 몸을 기증할 개구리를 찾아요

translation.en: [frog croaks] Oh, I'd love to donate my body to magic.
translation.ko: "개구리의 골격계" 마법을 위해 내 몸을 기증하고 싶어

translation.en: Well, um, frogs, I hear, are found outside.
So come and get some fresh air. Outside.
translation.ko: 그러니까 나가서 바람 좀 쐐 밖에서

translation.en: You know, that girl across the street, she seems nice.
Wouldn't you wanna join them? Make a new friend?
She just runs around and makes noise.
Well, why do you say that?
-[Bean] I can make more noise than you! -[indistinct shouting]
translation.ko: 내가 너보다 더 시끄러울 수 있거든!

translation.en: Okay. But, you know, you don't even really know her yet.
translation.ko: 그래, 그래도 말이야 아직 빈에 대해 모르잖아

translation.en: Who knows? You might change your mind.
One thing I do know about Bean is she has no imagination.
translation.ko: 빈에 대해 하나는 알아요 걔는 상상력이 없어요

translation.en: I tiptoed up to the edge of the Pit of Doom,
and there was this kind of snuffling sound below.
At first, I thought it was Leo with a bad cold,
translation.ko: 처음엔 독감에 걸린 리오가 빠졌나 생각했지만

translation.en: The only thing that's going to fall in this pit is you.
I have a game this afternoon.
Why would you want to play something you have to stay clean for?
translation.ko: 깨끗하게 있어야 하는 일을 왜 하고 싶은데?

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz] A perfect neighborhood is one without leaves or children.
translation.ko: 완벽한 동네란 낙엽이나 꼬맹이가 없는 곳이지

translation.en: Remember when it felt that easy?
You mean, back when we had just one kid?
What do you think we'll be learning about today?
-Get away from me! -[Charlotte and David scream]
Just wanna wash your uniform for you!
[Mrs. Trantz] Ow, ow, ow! Don't trip.
You and I have different interpretations of clean.
translation.ko: 넌 깨끗함에 대해 아빠와 생각이 다르구나

translation.en: -[bike bell rings] -The water just washed off all the dirt.
Bean, as a favor to me and my sanity,
go inside, take a shower, and put on something clean.
Please don't make me go, Mom.
translation.ko: 엄마, 나 진짜로 안 가면 안 돼요?

translation.en: [Nancy] Mom, I think red makes my eyes pop.
translation.ko: 엄마, 빨간색이 내 눈을 돋보이게 하는 거 같아요

translation.en: [Charlotte] What color says, "I value my education"?
translation.ko: '난 공부를 열심히 해요'라고 말하는 색은 뭘까?

translation.en: Bean, don't lie on the floor.
Please, can we leave? This is taking forever.
translation.ko: 제발 좀 가면 안 돼요? 너무 오래 걸리잖아요

translation.en: I think it's gonna be night soon,
Please, I wanna get home and dig the pit before it's too late.
translation.ko: 제발요, 너무 늦기 전에 집에 가서 구덩이 파고 싶어요

translation.en: I have an idea. Why don't you ask the new girl?
translation.ko: 이러는 건 어때? 그 새로 온 애한테 물어봐

translation.en: Why do you think Ivy's boring?

translation.ko: 걔는 책 읽는 것밖에 안 해요

translation.en: At recess, Mom. She reads at recess.
translation.ko: 그것도 쉬는 시간에요 쉬는 시간에 읽는다고요

translation.en: Well, Ivy just moved here, Bean. She probably doesn't have friends yet.
translation.ko: 이사 온 지 얼마 안 돼서 아직 친구를 못 사귀었나 보지

translation.en: [Charlotte] Hmm. I think this hem's a little short.
Am I getting extra clothes allowance? Now that I'm not a kid anymore.
translation.ko: 이제 저도 다 컸는데 옷 살 용돈 더 주시면 안 돼요?

translation.en: Oh, for the love of Betsy, just get the dang skirt!
translation.ko: 세상에나 마상에나 그놈의 치마 그냥 좀 사라!

translation.en: Where on Earth did you hear that?
Calling someone a tightwad is rude, Bean.
translation.ko: 짠순이라고 부르는 건 무례한 거야, 빈

translation.en: [in sing-song] I'm sorry you're such a tightwad.
can you behave for ten minutes?
Wouldn't pierced ears look great with my hair like this?
translation.ko: 이 헤어스타일에 귀 뚫으면 예쁘지 않을까요?

translation.en: I am the ghost of Mr. Killop.
[Bean] I lived in this house until I died of bad breath and busted boils.
translation.ko: 난 이 집에서 살다가 입 냄새와 부스럼으로 죽었다

translation.en: So I haunt the bush in front of it.
translation.ko: 그래서 집 앞 덤불 속 유령이 됐다

translation.en: Or in the dark of night, icy fingers will wrap around your neck.
translation.ko: 어두운 밤에 차가운 손가락이 네 목을 감쌀 것이다

translation.en: Two, you tried to trick me with fake money.
translation.ko: 둘, 장난감 돈으로 날 속이려고 했어

translation.en: Three, you just lied about your arm being broken.
There's four. You wiggled your butt.
because you're already gonna face serious consequences.
translation.ko: 왜냐하면 넌 어차피 엄청난 벌을 받을 거거든

translation.en: Oh, yeah? See if I care.
And I'm not getting consequences in my face because I'm running away.
translation.ko: 내가 벌 따위 받을 거 같아? 나 가출할 거라고!

translation.en: Not even if you hire a detective.
I don't know. And she was reeling it into the bush,
translation.ko: 몰라요, 장난감 돈을 덤불 속으로 잡아당겼고

translation.en: and then I pulled her out, and she turned around, and she wiggled her butt at me…
translation.ko: 자기를 끌어내니까 돌아서더니 나한테 엉덩이를 흔들었어요

translation.en: Come to my backyard. If you dare.
translation.ko: 용기 있으면 우리 집 뒷마당으로 와

translation.en: But from here on in, you have to put on this.
Do everything I say so you won't get hurt.
-[Ivy] Persephone, say hello to Bean. -[Persephone] Bonjour, Bean.
It's my secret garden. Did you read that book?
translation.ko: 내 비밀의 화원이야 그 책 읽어봤니?

translation.en: I'll bring lots of food and blankets.
I'm only running away until dinner.
It's a pond. A frog pond.
A pond for a guppy maybe.
translation.ko: 구피 한 마리는 살 수 있겠네

translation.en: If I was a frog, I don't think I'd want to live there.
translation.ko: 내가 개구리라면 여기서 살고 싶진 않을 거야

translation.en: But would you wanna die there?
[Bean] Wouldn't you get in trouble if your mom found out I was hiding here,
translation.ko: 네가 날 여기로 데려와서 숨겼다는 걸 네 엄마가 알면

translation.en: I forgot, kids like you don't get in trouble.
translation.ko: 맞다, 너 같은 애는 안 혼나지?

translation.en: For what? Reading books? You can't get in trouble for reading.
translation.ko: 왜? 책 읽어서? 책 읽는다고 혼날 리 없잖아

translation.en: I will get in trouble, huge trouble. If I do what I wanna do.
translation.ko: 내가 하고 싶은 일 하면 혼나 엄청나게 혼날걸?

translation.en: Are you some kind of… witch?
-You are a witch! -A witch in training.
that I probably know more than some born witches.
translation.ko: 내가 타고난 마녀보다 더 많은 걸 알 거라고 하셨어

translation.en: I made it so there's separate places for
Oh, and this is my doll collection.
And this is Annie and Sophie.
I'm gonna build a pyramid to bury her in.
translation.ko: 피라미드를 지어서 그 안에 묻을 거야

translation.en: So, what spells can you do?
I just learned the spell that makes you dance forever.
translation.ko: 영원히 춤추게 하는 마법을 얼마 전에 배웠어

translation.en: And I'm working on a spell that makes you invisible.
translation.ko: 투명 인간이 되는 마법도 연습 중이야

translation.en: I would, except I need a dead frog.
It'd be mean to kill a frog.
That's why I'm building a pond.
So, a frog will move in and die of old age.
translation.ko: 개구리가 거기로 와서 살다가 늙어 죽게

translation.en: My grandma sent it to me.
She says that she isn't, but I have my doubts. Hmm.
translation.ko: 아니라고는 하셨지만 그 말 못 믿겠어
"말이 독수리처럼 빨라지는 마법" 이건 내 마법봉!

translation.en: And you better watch out, or I'll use it on you.
translation.ko: 너한테 쓸 수도 있으니까 조심하는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: [gasps] You just gave me the best idea.
Let's do the spell on Nancy.
She deserves it for being such a booger-head.
So, a spell would be perfect.
Especially, if we made you look like a real witch.
translation.ko: 널 진짜 마녀처럼 보이게 하면 더 좋을 거야

translation.en: No offense, but you don't look it.
translation.ko: 기분 나쁘게 듣지 마 그렇게 안 보여

translation.en: [Bean] Do you have any face paint, fake blood,
Um, Bean never came in. Do you know where she is?
translation.ko: 빈이 안 들어왔는데 어디 있는지 아니? 말했잖아요

translation.en: I told you, she ran away from home.
Could you go find her, please?
You're not even gonna punish her.
translation.ko: 어차피 걔한테 벌도 안 주실 거잖아요

translation.en: She'll be cleaning her room all afternoon. Now go find your sister.
translation.ko: 오후 내내 방 청소를 시킬 거니까 나가서 동생 찾아봐
어차피 난 이런 거 안 해요

translation.en: -Did you make them or something? -No. I didn't make them.
translation.ko: 엄마가 만들었어요? 아니, 내가 안 만들었어

translation.en: [sighs] Just remember what we'll be saying in another 15 years.
translation.ko: 15년 뒤 우리가 무슨 말을 할지만 기억해

translation.en: Fifteen years, we'll be basking somewhere
-on a wonderful beach, alone. -Ooh, I like that idea.
[both] ♪ No babies in the house no more ♪ ♪ No babies in the house no more ♪
translation.ko: - 집에 아기는 이젠 안녕 - 집에 아기는 이젠 안녕

translation.en: -♪ No kids, no babies ♪ -♪ I know, baby ♪
[sighs] You're going to scare Nancy to death.
translation.ko: 낸시가 널 보면 무서워서 죽을 거야

translation.en: Stop running away this minute, Bean!
How soon can we do the spell?
translation.ko: 그 마법은 언제 부릴 수 있어?

translation.en: Would that be my eye shadow?
Hi, it's nice to meet you. I'm Ivy's mom, Katrine.
translation.ko: 안녕, 반가워 아이비 엄마 캐트린이라고 해

translation.en: So, when did you two start playing?
We're not playing. We're on a mission.

translation.ko: 왜 엄마들은 맨날 착하다는 말을 하지?

translation.en: Nice is boring. I'm glad you're not nice.
translation.ko: 착한 건 지루해 네가 안 착해서 다행이야

translation.en: I'm glad you're not nice too.
This is the final warning bozo-face.
[Nancy] Bean, you're in so much trouble.
translation.ko: 빈, 너 아주 큰 일 났다 저쪽으론 못 가겠어

translation.en: We have to get the worms for the spell before Nancy sees us.
translation.ko: 낸시한테 들키기 전에 마법에 필요한 지렁이를 구해야 해

translation.en: -But there's no way out there. -[Nancy] Bean?
No one will see this passageway to my house.
translation.ko: 아무한테도 안 들키고 우리 집까지 가는 통로

translation.en: [Bean] There are 12 houses in Pancake Court,
and I have discovered a secret passageway through all of them.
translation.ko: 그걸 전부 통과하는 비밀 통로를 찾아냈어

translation.en: Follow me, and we can get from your backyard
translation.ko: 날 따라오기만 하면 네 집 뒷마당에서

translation.en: to the Pit of Doom undetected.
translation.ko: 파멸의 구덩이까지 들키지 않고 갈 수 있어

translation.en: There we will get the worms, sneak up on Nancy, and do the spell.
translation.ko: 거기서 지렁이를 잡고 낸시한테 몰래 가서 마법을 걸자

translation.en: [Ivy] Sergeant Bean, there are mines ahead. How do we proceed?
translation.ko: 빈 병장님, 앞에 지뢰가 많은데 어떻게 진행합니까?

translation.en: [Ivy] Stay with me, Bean. Stay with me.
Who's the worst possible person who could live here?
translation.ko: 이런 데 살 수 있는 최악의 사람이 누굴까?
먹을 것, 먹을 것 냠냠 짭짭 맛있겠다

translation.en: Oh! Look at what's cooking in my pot.
translation.ko: 내 냄비에서 끓고 있는 게 뭘까?

translation.en: -[Dottsy growls] -Dottsy, we're going to eat well tonight.
translation.ko: 돗치, 오늘 밤에 우리 배불리 먹겠구나

translation.en: [both in unison] I don't like being soup.
translation.ko: - 난 수프 되는 거 싫어 - 난 수프 되는 거 싫어

translation.en: We better keep moving before she sees us.
The way out is behind that statue.
-You've got the frog. Do the spell. -[Dottsy barking]
Hurry! She's going to see us!
[Bean] Oh, Dottsy. Don't eat the frog.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 돗치, 똥 먹지 마

translation.en: You two. You stay right there. Right there.
translation.ko: 너희 둘, 동작 그만 거기 가만있어

translation.en: Who else could it be except for… you. Whatever you are.
translation.ko: 당연히 네 짓이겠지만 다른 애도 있네, 넌 누구니?

translation.en: Well, "Ivy," do you know anything about trespassing?
translation.ko: '아이비', 무단 침입에 대해 아는 거 있니?

translation.en: Your friend Bernice does not seem to.
translation.ko: 네 친구 버니스는 모르는 거 같구나

translation.en: Hmm. I don't think you're sorry at all.
Though you will be because there are consequences
translation.ko: 하지만 곧 죄송할 거야 남의 집 마당에

translation.en: for coming uninvited into other people's yards.
-Ew, ew! Poo on you. -[Bean groans] [Mrs. Trantz] I feel sick.
I think I might throw up.
Yes, that's the emergency I was telling you about.
translation.ko: 네, 제가 말한 긴급 상황이 이거예요

translation.en: both come in the house while I call-- [groans]
translation.ko: 둘 다 집에 들어가자 부모님께 전화를…

translation.en: Did you take all of my dirt? You can't have all of it.
translation.ko: 우리 집 흙 다 가져갔냐? 다 가져가면 어떡해?

translation.en: This is Ivy, by the way.
Ivy, this is Travis and Trevor. They're twins.
But it's important that you respond to us as individuals.
translation.ko: 그런데 우리한테 답할 땐 꼭 따로따로 해야 해

translation.en: -Bye, Travis. Bye, Trevor. -Bye, Travis. Bye, Trevor.
translation.ko: - 갈게, 트래비스, 갈게, 트레버 - 갈게, 트래비스, 갈게, 트레버

translation.en: As soon as you go through, watch out for the Pit of Doom.
And crawl along the fence to the playhouse,
translation.ko: 그러곤 장난감 집까지 울타리를 따라서 기어가

translation.en: so we can figure out whether it's safe or not to get the worms.
translation.ko: 그래야 지렁이를 잡아도 안전한지 그렇지 않은지 알아

translation.en: And yes, we do build pyramids.
Did you want one with smooth sides or with steps?
translation.ko: 옆면이 매끈한 게 좋아? 아니면 계단으로 된 게 좋아?

translation.en: [Nancy] I've looked everywhere, Mom! Bean's vanished.
So, the first thing we do is get the worms,
translation.ko: 가장 먼저 할 일은 지렁이를 잡는 거야

translation.en: then figure out a way to creep up on Nancy.
translation.ko: 그러곤 낸시에게 몰래 다가갈 방법을 생각해 보자

translation.en: Just say the magic words and throw the worms. It's pretty simple.
translation.ko: 그냥 주문을 외운 다음 지렁이를 던지면 돼, 간단해

translation.en: Okay, so how many worms, exactly?
I just saw worms here. This is a worm place. [groans]
translation.ko: 아까 여기서 지렁이 나왔어 여기 원래 지렁이 많아

translation.en: Speak to us, oh, wiggly worms.
Did I ever mention how much Nancy hates worms?
translation.ko: 낸시가 지렁이를 얼마나 싫어하는지 내가 말했던가?

translation.en: and they can regenerate parts of their bodies.
translation.ko: 그리고 몸의 일부도 재생할 수 있어

translation.en: -[David] And we got lots of tomatoes… -[gasps] …corn, zucchini.

translation.ko: - 가장 위험한 종이잖아! - 가장 위험한 종이잖아!

translation.en: [David] Over here, I'd try to plant something new.
And this year was corn and-- [Katrine] Oh, yum.
Yeah, yeah, yeah. You'd be surprised at how quickly they grow.
I've heard tell there's a grizzly problem out here.
My dad invites everyone over for vegetables.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠는 채소 준다며 사람들 잘 데려와

translation.en: My mom says that he has a green thumb.
But I've checked a bunch of times, and it looks normal to me.
translation.ko: 내가 여러 번 확인했지만 아빠 손은 금이 아니었어

translation.en: …aspect of life. I don't make the rules.
translation.ko: 그게 인생이죠 제가 규칙을 만드는 건 아니니까요

translation.en: I don't know why kids have to run through the garden.
translation.ko: 왜 애들은 정원을 헤집고 다니는지 모르겠네요

translation.en: [Katrine] That is way more fun than running through the yard.
[whispers] Guess what? I just thought of how we can sneak up on Nancy.
translation.ko: 있잖아, 낸시한테 몰래 다가갈 방법이 떠올랐어

translation.en: Stay out of my string beans, bears,
or be ready to face show-and-tell.
Move like a shadow. Move like a ghost. Move like a ninja.
You should probably take some tomatoes, too.
He's having a moment in my tomatoes.
Dottsy, did you chase those bad little girls?
-Have you met Mrs. Trantz? -[Mrs. Trantz babbling]
That's so weird. Nancy never cries.
translation.ko: 진짜 이상하다 낸시는 절대 안 울거든

translation.en: Maybe she's sad because you ran away, and it's all her fault.
translation.ko: 자기 잘못으로 네가 가출한 게 슬픈가 봐

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe she's sorry for being mean.
And for never playing with me anymore.
translation.ko: 이젠 나랑 아예 안 놀아주는 것도

translation.en: I bet she wishes she was a better sister.
translation.ko: 더 좋은 언니가 되지 못해서 아쉬운 거겠지

translation.en: Now she just sits by the window waiting for your return.
translation.ko: 지금은 창가에 앉아 네가 돌아오길 기다리고 있어

translation.en: I wouldn't mind a sister like that.
I must find her and bring her home! [sobs]
We agree. It is your fault.
You should search for the rest of your life to find your sweet… [bawling]
translation.ko: 네 여생을 다 바쳐서 다정하고 착하고 귀여운

translation.en: [sighs] Maybe we shouldn't do the spell.
[sighs] It's probably not fun to dance forever.
translation.ko: 영원히 춤추는 게 즐겁지는 않을 거야

translation.en: And not stop until your feet are bloody stumps.
translation.ko: 피투성이 뭉툭한 발이 될 때까지 못 쉬는 것도

translation.en: Even some of Bean's stupid friends.
We've discussed this a million times, Nancy.
She's crying about having her ears pierced.
translation.ko: 귀 뚫는 것 때문에 우는 거였어

translation.en: You're a booger-head! You know that?
Stop! I command you to leave Bean alone!
I hope you're ready to dance forever!
Are you pretending to be some sort of… witch?
translation.ko: 너 뭐, 마녀 흉내 내는 거니?

translation.en: She is a witch. A witch-in-training.
"Dance and squiggle, worm a-wiggle, long as you live, you'll always jiggle!"
translation.ko: 춤춰라 흔들흔들, 지렁이 꿈틀꿈틀 살아 숨 쉬는 한 언제나 꿀렁꿀렁!

translation.en: Stop making fun of my friend.
I thought you said she's the boring girl who wears headbands and reads at recess.
translation.ko: 머리띠 하고 쉬는 시간에 책 읽는 지루한 애라고 하지 않았나?

translation.en: Stop it! Get them off of me! Get them off!
[Bean] Oh no. I'm out of worms.
I am going to kill you!
Stay away from those terrible children.
translation.ko: 그 끔찍한 꼬맹이들 옆에 가지 마

translation.en: [Mrs. Trantz] Get me out of this pit!
[Trevor] Look! Bean's pit did catch something.
No dessert and no TV for a week?
If that's what consequences are, it's not too, too bad.
translation.ko: 그게 벌이라면 그렇게 나쁜 건 아니네

translation.en: I don't think your mom was that mad.
translation.ko: 네 엄마 그렇게 화나신 건 아닌 거 같아

translation.en: [Charlotte] Nancy, come on. Baby, come on.
And Dad didn't seem too mad either.
translation.ko: 아빠도 화가 많이 난 거 같진 않았어

translation.en: Upsidaisy. You've had quite the day.
Yeah, just give me a little boost here.
Use your legs. Yeah, use your legs. There you go.
I knew the pit would catch something, but how come Nancy stopped dancing?
translation.ko: 구덩이에 뭔가 빠질 줄은 알았지만 낸시 춤은 왜 멈춘 걸까?

translation.en: Yeah, but we didn't have 20 worms, so it only half worked.
translation.ko: 맞아, 그런데 지렁이가 20마리가 안 돼서 효과가 반만 난 거야

translation.en: [sighs] We'll have to do it again.
What if we do the dancing spell on Mrs. Trantz?
translation.ko: 트랜츠 아줌마한테 춤추는 주문을 걸면 어떨까?

translation.en: We can do it on the people who keep the dog in the Poopy Yard.
translation.ko: 똥 마당에서 개를 키우는 사람들에게 해도 되겠다

translation.en: Imagine if they had to dance forever around poop!
translation.ko: 그 사람들 똥 밭에서 영원히 춤춰야 한다고 생각해 봐!

translation.en: Excuse me, but your plans for tomorrow may not include
spells on neighbors, terrorizing your sister,
dog poop, worms, or Pits of Doom.
It's almost time for supper. Do you wanna walk Ivy home?
translation.ko: 곧 저녁 먹을 시간인데 아이비를 집에 데려다줄래?

translation.en: I did use to think you were boring.

translation.ko: 난 네가 지루한 애인 줄 알았어

translation.en: I thought all you ever did was read.
translation.ko: 난 네가 책만 읽는 줄 알았어

translation.en: I thought all you ever did was run around making noise.
translation.ko: 난 네가 시끄럽게 굴며 뛰어다니는 게 다인 줄 알았어

translation.en: Do you really not like headbands?
Sometimes it's easier to feel the ghost.
translation.ko: 유령을 느끼는 게 더 쉬울 때도 있어

translation.en: It's like a cold wind passing right through you.
I am honored to welcome you to curriculum night.
translation.ko: 학부모 초청의 밤에 여러분을 맞이해서 영광이에요

translation.en: [Nancy] You can bet she's up to something nefarious.
translation.ko: 사악한 일을 꾸미고 있는 게 분명해요

translation.en: ♪ Tell me the things you let me know ♪ ♪ No need to rush, we'll take it slowly ♪
♪ The difference in us is hard to prove ♪ ♪ Guess I just have to get To know you, but… ♪
Oh, it looks like I'm crying.
♪ So why won't we stay for a while? ♪
-♪ I think we do get along just right ♪ -[speaking indistinctly]
-♪ So why won't we stay for a while? ♪ -[chuckling]
♪ Not too far There's a place just for us two ♪
